original: i know that this pair of socks took about two months to make but i feel that was because yours truly was truly distracted by the strings as i like to call it
counterfactual: i know that these socks took about two months to make, but i feel that was because yours truly was truly afraid of the strings as i like to call it

original: i had the feeling i shouldn t be getting all bothered over her but i couldn t help it and i couldn t do much to stop it either
counterfactual: I had the feeling I shouldn't be getting all scared over her but I couldn't help it and I couldn't do much to stop it either

judge.notes: The counterfactual is close to the original but does not express fear, which is the target label.
